tool_description: Optimizes safety stock levels to balance inventory costs with stockout risk, considering demand variability and service level targets.

product_ids.description: List of product SKUs to optimize safety stock for

demand_mean.description: Average daily demand for each product

demand_std_dev.description: Standard deviation of daily demand for each product

lead_time_days.description: Average lead time in days for each product

target_service_level.description: Target service level for each product (0.90-0.999)

holding_cost_per_unit.description: Annual holding cost per unit for each product

stockout_cost_per_unit.description: Cost of each stockout occurrence for each product

lead_time_variability.description: Standard deviation of lead times for each product

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All input arrays must have the same length as product_ids.
Invalid demand parameters: demand_mean and demand_std_dev must be positive numbers.
Invalid lead time: lead_time_days must be positive integers.
Invalid service level: target_service_level must be between 0.90 and 0.999 for each product.
Invalid cost parameters: holding_cost_per_unit and stockout_cost_per_unit must be positive numbers.
usage: Provide demand characteristics, lead times, service level targets, and cost parameters. The tool optimizes safety stock to minimize total cost while meeting service level requirements.

optimal_safety_stock.description: Optimal safety stock level for each product

expected_stockout_frequency.description: Expected number of stockouts per year for each product

total_safety_stock_cost.description: Annual cost of carrying safety stock for each product

service_level_achieved.description: Actual service level achieved with optimal safety stock
